key_risks: Cyclical dependence on semiconductor and display industries
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on limited suppliers
Geopolitical exposure in Asia, particularly China and Taiwan
Intense competition from larger players and in-house production by major semiconductor manufacturers
Technological obsolescence requiring continuous R&D investment
controversies: Internal review and leadership changes, including the General Counsel being placed on leave
Shareholder investigation by Purcell & Lefkowitz LLP
environmental_issues: Energy-efficient manufacturing processes and reduced chemical waste by 25% from 2019 to 2020
social_issues: Global workforce development, particularly in Asia
governance_issues: Questions about governance due to internal review and leadership changes
